|brand = ASUS |model = TUF |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Dongle |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/08/2017‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_TUF_Dongle |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = Bluetooth |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 1234 |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = MSQ-TUFDONGLE |icid = 3568A-TUFDONGLE |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Texas Instruments;CC2540; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = Bluetooth |wififreq = <!-- 2.4 or 5, 60 --> |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0 |802dot11_protocols = Bluetooth |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = Bluetooth USB adapter
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/29/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The device is shown in the [https://fccid.io/MSQ-TUFDONGLE/Internal-Photos/TUF-Dongle-Inpho-3443908 FCC photos] as using... *''[[Texas Instruments]]'' [http://www.ti.com/product/cc2540 CC2540] BT 4.0 LE SoC (MCU + USB)
Likely included with the [https://www.asus.com/us/Motherboards/TUF-X299-MARK-1/overview/ ''ASUS TUF X299 MARK 1''] motherboard.
==See also== :[[Bluetooth devices]] *[[ASUS USB-BT211]] - ''Mini Bluetooth 3.0 Dongle'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/USBBT211_Mini_Bluetooth_Dongle/ PPage] :FCC ID: MSQ-USBBT211 (Bluetooth 3.0 + HS/2.1 + EDR) :[[Atheros]] AR3011, USB ID: 0cf3:3002, OUI: 00:02:72 *[[ASUS USB-BT400]] - ''Bluetooth 4.0 USB Adapter'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/USBBT400/ PPage] :FCC ID: MSQ-USBBT400 (Bluetooth 4.0 LE/USB 2.0) *[[ASUS TUF Dongle]] - ''Bluetooth 4.0 USB Dongle'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Bluetooth-Antennas-Products/ PPage] :FCC ID: MSQ-TUFDONGLE (Bluetooth 4.0 LE/USB 2.0) *[[ASUS SP-BT23]] - ''Portable Bluetooth Stereo Speakers''
[[Category:English Documentation]]
